description: <p>Rest phases, transitions, descents – the backcountry cold hits once you step off the skin track. Light, packable, and warm, the Rush is ready when output stops and temperatures drop. Windproof, water repellant, and highly breathable, the GORE-TEX INFINIUM™ outer utilizes our Hadron™ face fabric for maximum durability, minimal weight. 100gsm Coreloft™ insulates, an air-permeable liner speeds vapour transfer, the helmet-compatible StormHood™ adds warmth, and an embedded RECCO® reflector aids search and rescue.</p> <p>Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.<br></p> <p>Size and Fit Tips: <i>Regular Fit</i> - Our classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over our insulation and midlayers. Be sure to double-check our new sizing charts before checkout.</p>
name: Rush Insulated Jacket - Womens
